name: BlockbyBlock
description: The current approach to data analysis within the crypto realm is far from optimal. It is often cumbersome, time-consuming, and necessitates juggling between multiple platforms, which results in an inconvenient and inefficient process. BlockbyBlock's mission is to provide smooth, intuitive, and accessible crypto analysis tools, ranging from initial analysis to customizable alerts, leveraging the power of collective intelligence where possible. As part of Phase 1, come take advantage of more than 40 telegram-based tools , and behold what Phases 2 & 3 will offer in the near future.
